pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers must wear: long-sleeved shirt and long pants; shoes plus socks. For aerial applications, mixers and loaders must also wear chemical-resistant gloves made of barrier laminate, butyl rubber ≥14 mils, nitrile rubber ≥14 mils, neoprene rubber ≥14 mils, natural rubber ≥14 mils, polyethylene, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) ≥14 mils, or Viton™ ≥14 mils.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.
